scripts.update: npm run clean && npm run download && npm run generate && npm run build
scripts.clean:svg: set -eu; for w in 400; do npx @material-design-icons/scripts delete svg --symbols --in svg/$w; done
scripts.download: npm run download:font && npm run download:fonts && npm run download:svg && npm run download:metadata && npm run copy:metadata
scripts.download:fonts: set -eu; for w in 400; do npx @material-design-icons/scripts download font --symbols --evergreen --weight $w --grade 0 --size 48 --to font/$w; done
scripts.download:svg: set -eu; for w in 400; do npx @material-design-icons/scripts download svg --symbols --weight $w --to svg/$w; done
scripts.generate: npm run generate:types && npm run copy:types
scripts.copy:types: set -eu; for w in 400; do cp material-symbols/index.d.ts font/$w; done
scripts.build: npm run build:font && npm run build:svg
